```{r}
#install.packages("devtools")
#devtools::install_github("agnesdeng/mixgb")
library(mixgb)
source("dataSim2.R")
```

```{r}
data <- simFun(2000, 1000)
imp <- mixgb(data[[2]], m = 5)
```

```{r}
full_fit <- lm(Y ~ X + Z, data = data[[1]])
valid_fit <- lm(Y ~ X + Z, data = data[[3]])
imp_fit <- lm(Y ~ X + Z, data = imp[[1]])

summary(full_fit)
summary(valid_fit)
summary(imp_fit)
```
